title: The 2022 Golfdom Summit partners and what they had to say to the super attendees - Golfdom magazine
summary: The 2022 Golfdom Summit was held recently, and partners presented their latest products and innovations to a room full of top-level superintendents from around the U.S. Many of the products and processes presented at the summit could be considered either green innovations, business innovations, green products, or green processes. Green innovations contribute to environmental sustainability goals, business innovations are new or improved products or processes that differ significantly from the firm's previous products or processes, green products are designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces their environmental impact throughout their life cycle, and green processes minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
green_innovation: TRUE; The article describes multiple products and processes that contribute to environmental sustainability goals, such as the Smithco sprayers, rollers and bunker rakes that are designed to reduce environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
business_innovation: TRUE; The article describes multiple products and processes that differ significantly from the firm's previous products or processes, such as the Turfco Widespin 1550 Broadcast Topdresser that is designed to be more efficient and productive than previous models.
green_product: TRUE; The article describes multiple products that are designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces their environmental impact throughout their life cycle, such as the PBI-Gordon Pedigree fungicide and Reunion fungicide.
green_process: TRUE; The article describes multiple processes that minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability, such as the Seago International F-19 Gen 3 hover mower that is designed to reduce noise pollution and emissions.
likely_naics_codes: ['333999 - All Other Miscellaneous Fabricated Metal Product Manufacturing', '332313 - Plate Work Fabrication', '332322 - Sheet Metal Stamping', '332996 - Fabricated Pipe and Pipe Fitting Manufacturing']
greenwashing: FALSE; The article does not provide any evidence to suggest that the products or processes described are examples of greenwashing.

title: Flow Racks Put Automotive Supplier in the Driver's Seat - Assembly Magazine
summary: Adient, an automotive seating manufacturer, implemented UNEX Flow Cell workstations at its West Point, GA plant to improve flexibility and efficiency in its assembly line. The Flow Cell units optimize space utilization, enable uninterrupted workflow, and are reusable, providing cost savings and sustainability benefits. The Flow Cells support Adient's efforts to meet evolving customer demands and maintain competitiveness in the industry.
likely_naics_codes: ['336312 - Motor Vehicle Seating and Interior Trim Manufacturing', '336399 - All Other Motor Vehicle Parts Manufacturing', '337910 - Sporting and Athletic Goods Manufacturing', '326199 - Other Plastics Product Manufacturing']

title: Scaling Up EV Battery Manufacturing | ASSEMBLY - Assembly Magazine
summary: The demand for batteries is skyrocketing due to the growing popularity of electric vehicles. To meet this demand, battery manufacturers need to invest in research and development, improve volumetric energy density, and address supply chain issues. The battery manufacturing industry faces numerous challenges, including the need to develop new materials and battery types, maximize battery quality, develop new manufacturing processes, and overcome supply chain issues.
green_innovation: TRUE. The article discusses the need for battery manufacturers to invest in research and development to create more powerful, longer lasting batteries. This is a green innovation because it will help to reduce the environmental impact of electric vehicles.
business_innovation: TRUE. The article discusses the need for battery manufacturers to adopt more efficient manufacturing processes. This is a business innovation because it will help to reduce the cost of producing batteries.
green_product: TRUE. The article discusses the need for battery manufacturers to develop new materials and battery types that are more environmentally friendly. This is a green product because it will help to reduce the environmental impact of electric vehicles.
green_process: TRUE. The article discusses the need for battery manufacturers to develop new manufacturing processes that are more efficient and environmentally friendly. This is a green process because it will help to reduce the environmental impact of battery production.
